name: The Lost Recon Bot
description:
The Lost Recon Robot (aka RBot in space).

It's a very tiny visual novel (less than 5 mins) I built as a first project with Ren'Py.

Whole process was around 8-ish hours, most of which was the scripting. ^^;

So, it's a bit clunky, but I hope you can enjoy it. =)

*I think the Mac version works. I just used the default build settings for it.
